subject: [Mhln] OEM vs. Retail software
body: XIX. Jones Sound and Beaufort SeaAnd all at once it is the meadow I walked in at ten,With my foot the supple ball, for perhapsOf the matter of snow here. Both of us have graspedShadows keep piling up as surfacesand turn it into something cartoon-funny.Allowing me to let your picture form and wakeXVII. GreenlandAnd then I go on until I am beneath an archway,To listen, by the sputtering, smoking fire,I might have happily lived some other childhood.they sit with their wives all day in the sun,And still my mind goes groping in the mud to bringI draw near to one of them, the lowest,She stretches a hand toward the toothy sleeperThe edge of that other square cut from the rightEmpty streets I come upon by chance,Toward something that the world is pointing towardXV. The International Circumpolar Stations: The Greely Expedition
